importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the article's publication, indicating the most recent update on Biden's treatment progress.
Date when Biden's personal office confirmed diagnosis of aggressive prostate cancer that had spread to bones.
Date when Biden began a pill regimen for prostate cancer treatment earlier in the year.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The time period during which Biden underwent treatment, including radiation therapy and a pill regimen, from early 2025 to the completion of radiation therapy in late October 2025.

keyTakeAways: Former President Joe Biden has completed a course of radiation therapy for prostate cancer.
The treatment involved a prior pill regimen and Mohs surgery for skin cancer.
Biden was diagnosed with an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones.
He expressed confidence in overcoming the illness, stating it hadn't penetrated vital organs.
His daughter Ashley shared a video and photo celebrating the completion of radiation therapy, thanking medical staff at Penn Medicine.
Biden remains active in public life, including upcoming public events such as a lifetime achievement award in Boston and a speech for the Nebraska Democratic Party in Omaha.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former President Joe Biden has completed a course of radiation therapy as part of his treatment for aggressive prostate cancer that had spread to his bones. He previously began a pill regimen and underwent Mohs surgery for skin cancer. His daughter Ashley shared a celebratory video and photo from Penn Medicine Radiation Oncology in Philadelphia, thanking the medical staff. While the article does not specify future treatment steps, Biden remains active in public life, with upcoming speaking engagements including a lifetime achievement award at the Edward M. Kennedy Institute in Boston and a speech for the Nebraska Democratic Party in Omaha. His public health journey has drawn significant global attention due to his high profile and the visibility of his treatment journey.
title: Biden completes a course of radiation therapy for cancer treatment
